game.title: The Lost City
game.objective: Find the lost city of Zerzura and retrieve an ancient artifact.
game.description: The city of Zerzura is hidden deep within a dense jungle, guarded by treacherous terrain and ferocious beasts. You must navigate through the jungle, avoiding danger at every turn, to reach the city and claim the artifact.

task.objective: Find a path through the jungle that leads to Zerzura.
task.description: The jungle is dense and unforgiving. You must search for a narrow path that winds its way through the underbrush, avoiding deadly traps and hidden pitfalls.

task.objective: Navigate the treacherous terrain of the jungle to reach Zerzura.
task.description: The path ahead is fraught with danger. You must navigate through ravines, climb steep cliffs, and avoid deadly predators.

task.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from within Zerzura's ruins.
task.description: The city is full of traps and puzzles. You must solve the riddles and unlock the doors to reach the artifact before time runs out.
